alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Dickenson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 2:38PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS WILL AFFECT DICKENSON...BUCHANAN... MCDOWELL...SOUTH CENTRAL KANAWHA...SOUTHERN WEBSTER...WYOMING... POCAHONTAS...NICHOLAS...SOUTHEASTERN MINGO...RALEIGH...SOUTHERN LOGAN...FAYETTE AND SOUTHEASTERN BOONE COUNTIES... At 235 PM EST, radar indicated gusty winds and showers located along a cold front extending from 12 miles southeast of Mill Creek to Argo. Movement was east at 35 mph. Winds in excess of 35 mph are possible with this front, followed by additional 20 to 35 mph gusts this afternoon. Locations impacted include... Beckley, Summersville, Fayetteville, Welch, Richwood, Clintwood, Marlinton, Grundy, Pineville, Haysi, Greenbank, Breaks Interstate, Davenport, John Flannagan Lake, Webster Springs, Cass Scenic Railroad, Sandstone, Babcock State Park, Oak Hill and Mullens. This includes the following highways... West Virginia Turnpike between mile markers 29 and 70. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 120 and 137. Route 19 between mile markers 1 and 45.
